review: I had been to hospital and it was for  gynecological  related. ****** *** ***** Medicine was prescribed by the doctor.  I can recommend this doctor to my family or friends. I am satisfied with the treatment given.  I am good now. There was no waiting time when I went like 15 minutes. I can rate the doctor 5 out of 5, 5 being highest.

I had been to hospital in january 2020 and it was for  pregnancy related treatment. ****** *** ***** Injection was prescribed by the doctor. I am satisfied with the treatment given.  I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. Waiting time was for 5-10 minutes. I am good now. I had abortion. Hospitality was good.

I had been to hospital and it was for gynecological related. Delivery was done by same doctor. Doctor was good. Medicine was prescribed by the doctor.  She prescribed calcium and iron tablets. Scanning was done. Consultation and staff was good. I am satisfied with the treatment given. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. There was no waiting time when I went because of covid.  I can rate the doctor 4.5 out of 5, 5 being highest.

Consultation experience was good and I have been consulting her from past 4 to 5 months so everything was good and I am satisfied with the doctor and doctor treatment. There was not much waiting time for the doctor. I don''t think that there is any need for improvement everything was good. Staff and maintenance was good. I''m already recommending this doctor to my family and friends.

Consultation experience was good, I am satisfied with the doctor and doctor treatment. There was a bit of a long waiting time to consult the doctor. When it comes to improvement, the waiting time was more. I would like to recommend this doctor to my family and friends

I went to meet the doctor as had issues related to Irregular periods. *** ****** *** ***** Scanning I did but scanning cost very high when compared to other hospitals in Bangalore. Tablets were prescribed by doctor. Doctor was really good. There was no waiting time when I went. I am satisfied with the treatment given. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends.

I Visited Dr. Shashikala Ksheerasagar at Vikram Hospital as i has some Urine Infection.*** ****** ** ********* she checked completely and she gave me the treatment and I am Good now.There was no wait time at all.I would recommend the Doctor to my friends and family.I would rate 4.5 out of 5 to Dr. Shashikala Ksheerasagar.

I Visited Dr. Shashikala Ksheerasagar at Vikram Hospital for my wife about pregnancy to consult about the same *** ****** *** **** **** she is very understanding I visit this Doctor often for my wife to consult about the Pregnancy.There was no much wait time as the preference will be given to late stage pregnancy patient sometimes rarely we have to wait that is fine.I would rating of 4.8 out of 5 to Dr. Shashikala Ksheerasagar

I visited the hospital as I had health issues on Irregular periods. ****** *** ***** I have been consulting for 11 years with doctor. Scanning was done. She told it might have happened due to food. Waiting time was nearly the whole day including scanning, I need to wait and later to meet the doctor. I am satisfied with the treatment given. I have already recommend doctor to my family or friends. Now I am fine.

We had visited the hospital for my wife as she had abortion thrice. ****** *** ***** Even the doctor told to come in march month, but I was unable to go. Need to visit again to meet the doctor. Medical tests like scanning, blood tests, my sperm count test were done. Medicine was prescribed by the doctor. There was no waiting time when I went. I am satisfied with the treatment given. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends.
